overview:
Dhruv Choudhrie, investor, business owner and entrepreneur was born in India in 1974.

He is active in the corporate banking industry and is a member of the Board of Directors of Alpha G Corp. He is a highly experienced corporate director with specialized skills in building revenue streams and implementing diversification and expansion plans. Along with his brother Bhanu Choudhrie, he has created successful ventures in new technologies, real estate, hospitality and finance. Dhruv Choudhrie also is a liberal contributor to many charitable organizations and has been recognized for his work as a donor to important international causes.

Mr. Choudhrie has been the executive director of C&C Alpha Group Ltd (CCAG) since 2001 and the group has a vast portfolio of investments, from luxury award-winning spa hotels in India and Mauritius to care homes in the UK. In addition to his business ventures, Mr. Choudhrie also pursues many philanthropic causes and is a liberal donor to charities around the world.
